casebody.data:
Edward G. SHLIKAS, petitioner,
v.
SLM CORPORATION (SALLIE MAE), et al. No. 13-8887. Supreme Court of the United States May 5, 2014.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until May 27, 2014, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance *2160with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
